reviewText: Excellent video, lots of material about the Ironclads. Good for the person who knows little or nothing about these Civil War ships, as well as for the history buff who would like to know more about them. Well done on a small budget.

I really didn't learn much from this film; but it was very good on fact presentation. With modern special effects the film could have been spectacular.  I would have given it 5 stars; but I felt the movie was too short and seemed rushed.  It would have been better at 90 minutes and not 55

This item was for a total Civil War fan.
Upon receiving, he loved it and will be looking for more of the same nature.
Thank you
